title: Discoveries of Canada Burial Sites Stir Painful Memories for Indigenous People
content:
1. Discoveries of Canada Burial Sites Stir Painful Memories for Indigenous People  The Wall Street Journal
  2. With Discovery of Unmarked Graves, Canada’s Indigenous Seek Reckoning  The New York Times
  3. Memorials planned for unmarked graves found at Saskatchewan residential school site  Global News
  4. Don't be fooled by Trudeau's apology over Canada's genocide against indigenous people: Global Times editorial  Global Times
  5. A call to Canadians: Help us find every burial site. Bring every lost Indigenous child home. Prove that you are who you claim to be  The Globe and Mail
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
